title: Metaphor: ReFantazio Sets Sales Record For Atlus - Kinda Funny Games Daily 10.11.24
description:
Pre-order New World: Aeternum now on PlayStation 5 or Xbox Series X|S to get the Azoth Stalker Wolf Mount and prepare for launch on October 15! https://bit.ly/3XROcCT 

Metaphor: ReFantazio is a hit, Disco Elysium has spawned multiple new studios, and Xbox will soon sell games on the android app.

Today after, KFGD, you’ll get:
 - GAMESCAST - Greg’s impressions of Metaphor: ReFantazio
 - Game Showdown after that!
 - The STREAM is Dead By Daylight!
If you’re a Kinda Funny Member:
 - You can get today’s Gregway

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start
00:02:35 - Housekeeping
            -  The Roper Report   -
00:07:53 - Metaphor: ReFantazio’ Just Set A First Day Sales Record For Atlus
00:15:50 - Two Disco Elysium spin-off studios have been announced on the same day
00:29:41 - Xbox will soon sell games directly in the Android app
00:34:59 - Tomb Raider IV-VI Remastered launches on PS5 and PS4 Feb 14, 2025
00:42:31 - Wee News! 
00:47:15 - SuperChats & You’re Wrong
